Today it emerged that Katie Price's bankruptcy hearing had been moved yet again - but the model still had an appointment to keep, for a lip filler and botox top-up.

articles.title: EastEnders cancelled as BBC soap taken off air in schedule shake-up - The Mirror
articles.description: EastEnders will not air in its usual Wednesday slot due to a change to BBC One's schedule.
articles.content:
EastEnders has been removed from its 7.30pm slot on BBC One tonight to make way for an FA Cup fourth round match. 
 The BBC soap will air on Friday night instead to accommodate the clash between Sun… [+2463 chars]

articles.description: Better has been filmed across Leeds and West Yorkshire and is set to air on BBC 1
articles.content:
